content: NEW YORK  Feb 14 Several big-name U.S. hedge fund investors in the fourth quarter moved significant parts of their portfolios into financial and pharmaceutical stocks that are expected to benefit under the Trump administration  helping to power the sector to its best January performance in four years.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: Bets on financials  pharma power U.S. hedge funds' strong start to year

content: Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc said on Tuesday its drug to treat psychosis in patients suffering from Alzheimer's disease met its main goal in a mid-stage study  sending its shares up as much as 18.5 percent.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: Acadia says Alzheimer's psychosis drug clears mid-stage study

content: General Motors said it would add a third shift and 650 jobs at its factory in Spring Hill  Tennessee to meet higher demand for its recently launched Cadillac XT5 and GMC Acadia crossover SUVs.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: GM to add 650 jobs at Spring Hill factory to meet SUV demand

content: Allergan Plc  CEO Brent Saunders calls them "stepping stones" - small  bolt-on acquisitions  as opposed to the mega-deals common in the drug industry. And they're expected to boost dealmaking in sectors ranging from neurology to skin care.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: Allergan pays top dollar for 'stepping stones' from neurology to dermatology

content: Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc's drug for psychosis linked to Parkinson's disease was approved in the United States on Friday  becoming the first treatment for the condition to get a nod in the country.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: U.S. approves first drug for psychosis linked to Parkinson's

content: April 28 An imminent ruling on Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc's drug for Parkinson's disease psychosis is being closely watched by a Bermuda-based company with a similar treatment for dementia.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: Acadia drug approval could clear way for Axovant dementia therapy

content: An advisory panel to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration backed an approval for Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc's drug for psychosis related to Parkinson's disease.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: FDA panel backs Acadia drug for psychosis linked to Parkinson's

content: March 29 An advisory panel to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration backed an approval for Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc's drug for psychosis related to Parkinson's disease.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: UPDATE 2-FDA panel backs Acadia drug for psychosis linked to Parkinson's

content: * Fda advisory committee votes 12 to 2 that benefits of acadia pharmaceuticals' nuplazid(tm) (pimavanserin) for the treatment of psychosis associated with parkinson's disease outweigh the risks  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:    (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1-646-223-8780)
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: BRIEF-Acadia Pharma says FDA panel votes 12 to 2 on benefit-risk profile of its drug for Parkinson's Disease psychosis

content: Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc said it had delayed submitting a U.S. marketing application for its lead drug  nuplazid  and that its chief executive was retiring.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: Acadia delays U.S. application to market lead drug  CEO retires

content: March 11 Acadia Pharmaceuticals Inc  said it had delayed submitting a U.S. marketing application for its lead drug  nuplazid  and that its chief executive was retiring.
name: ACADIA Pharmaceuticals Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Acadia delays U.S. application to market lead drug  CEO retires
